fields.name: Text_Display
fields.fieldText: This service appointment has already been {!SA_Record.Status}. Further action is not possible.

fields.name: FaultMessage
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception when try to create DCF Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: display1
fields.fieldText: Mandatory (standard) PPE to be worn at all times: Hi-Viz clothing + Body Protection + Head Protection + Foot Protection Additional items of PPE shall be worn for individual items of work as required by the company H&S guidelines.

fields.name: display2
fields.fieldText: Method of Working - Prepare Specific Method Statement for work to be completed. Apply Generic Risk Assessments for each item of standard work to be carried out.

fields.name: display3
fields.fieldText: Record Keeping: Accurate records of all work carried out to be maintained and passed back to Engineering Department. Records of all site checks to be kept.

fields.name: display4
fields.fieldText: Training: All workers shall be trained for the items of work required. At all times a minimum of one worker on site shall be SWQR trained and carry the Street works card. The roaming supervisor responsible for the Works shall be SWQR trained. The Method Statement, Risk Assessment and Emergency plan will be explained and discussed with all workers, and a copy made available to them. Maintain records of training.

fields.name: display5
fields.fieldText: Monitoring: Periodic Checks to be carried out by Supervisor to confirm compliance with Safe Systems of Work.

fields.name: What_Activity_Type_are_you_carrying_out
